mission creep.translation[0].definitions: a series of gradual changes in the aim of a group of people, with the result that they do something different from what they planned to do at the beginning
mission creep.translation[1].definitions: a series of gradual changes in the aim of the people who manage a company or organization, with the result that they do something different from what they planned to do at the beginning
The penalty clause in the contract leaves no room for mission creep.
